name: com.toolkid.unitytimer
description: This is a simple timer tool that can be used in Unity games. It provides a simple API that allows you to create timers, set durations, start and stop timers, and register timer callbacks. It is based on Unity's UniTask library and implemented using C# 7.0's async/await syntax.

samples.description: Performs a simple stopwatch that can be used in Unity games.
